description.original: Adds a pomodoro timer to your status bar.
description.translation: Adds a pomodoro timer to your status bar.

dict.Notice(\"Failed to read the daily note t: Notice("Failed to read the daily note template")
dict..error(`Failed to read the daily note te: .error(`Failed to read the daily note template '${templatePath}'`, err)
dict..setDesc(\"Number of pomos before a long: .setDesc("Number of pomos before a long break; leave blank for default")
dict..setDesc(\"Start each pomodoro and break: .setDesc("Start each pomodoro and break automatically. When off, click the sidebar icon on the left or use the toggle pause command to start the next timer")
dict..setDesc(\"Number of pomodoro + break cy: .setDesc("Number of pomodoro + break cycles to run automatically before stopping. Default is 0 (stops after every pomodoro and every break)")
dict..setDesc(\"Toggle left sidebar icon. Res: .setDesc("Toggle left sidebar icon. Restart Obsidian for the change to take effect")
dict..setDesc(\"Toggle üèñÔ∏è/üçÖ emoji tha: .setDesc("Toggle üèñÔ∏è/üçÖ emoji that indicate whether a timer is a pomodoro or a break.")
dict..setDesc(\"Use system notifications at t: .setDesc("Use system notifications at the end of each pomodoro and break")
dict..setDesc(\"Play notification sound at th: .setDesc("Play notification sound at the end of each pomodoro and break")
dict..setDesc(\"Play white noise while timer: .setDesc("Play white noise while timer is active")
dict..setDesc(\"If file doesn't already exist: .setDesc("If file doesn't already exist, it will be created")
dict..setDesc(\"Logs to the end of today's da: .setDesc("Logs to the end of today's daily note")
dict..setDesc(\"Specify format for the logtex: .setDesc("Specify format for the logtext using moment syntax")
dict..setDesc(\"In log, append link pointing: .setDesc("In log, append link pointing to the note that was active when you started the pomodoro")
